mapper.select: SELECT RECRUIT_NO, RECRUIT_TITLE, RECRUIT_INFO, RECRUIT_STATE, RECRUIT_MAIN, RECURIT_POSI, RECRUIT_IMG, RECRUIT_MINSALARY, RECRUIT_MAXSALARY, RECRUIT_REQU, RECRUIT_DL, RECRUIT_COUNT, C2.COMP_NO, RECRUITS.CREATED_AT, COMP_NAME, COMP_INFO, COMP_EMAIL, COMP_ADDRESS, COMP_HEADCOUNT, COMP_BIRTH, COMP_PM, U.USER_NO as Manager_No, U.USER_AVATAR as Manager_Avatar, U.USER_NAME as Manager_Name, U.USER_COMP as Manager_Comp FROM RECRUITS LEFT JOIN COMPANYS C2 on C2.COMP_NO = RECRUITS.COMP_NO LEFT JOIN USERS U on U.USER_NO = C2.USER_NO WHERE RECRUIT_NO = #{rno}
select count(*) from APPLIES where RECRUIT_NO = #{rno}
SELECT s.SKILL_NAME, S.SKILL_NO FROM RECRUIT_SKILLS LEFT JOIN SKILLS S on S.SKILL_NO = RECRUIT_SKILLS.SKILL_NO WHERE RECRUIT_NO = #{rno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NUKACOLA.DECLARES (USER_NO, RECRUIT_NO, DECLARE_TITLE, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{recruitNo}, #{declareTitle}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select:
select comp_no
from companys join users using (user_no) where user_no = #{userNo}

select APPLIES.APPLY_NO, APPLY_COMMENT, APPLY_PROG, APPLIES.CREATED_AT, APPLIES.UPDATED_AT, APPLIES.USER_NO, APPLIES.RECRUIT_NO, R.RECRUIT_TITLE, R.COMP_NO, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_EDU, C2.USER_NO as manager1_no, C2.COMP_PM as manager2_no from APPLIES left join RECRUITS R on R.RECRUIT_NO = APPLIES.RECRUIT_NO left join USERS U on U.USER_NO = APPLIES.USER_NO left join COMPANYS C2 on R.COMP_NO = C2.COMP_NO where APPLY_NO = #{ano}
select S.SKILL_NO, S.SKILL_NAME from USER_FIELDS left outer join SKILLS S on S.SKILL_NO = USER_FIELDS.SKILL_NO where USER_NO = #{uno}

select CAREERS.COMP_NO, CAREER_POSI ,to_char(CAREERS.ENTERED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ENTERED_AT, COMP_NAME, COMP_LOGO from CAREERS left join COMPANYS C2 on C2.COMP_NO = CAREERS.COMP_NO where CAREERS.USER_NO = #{uno}
